ne19:10.1_0: “All feelings in this way they give up desire, greed, relishing, and craving for feelings. They’re dedicated to continued existence. They have a displeasure and eliminated without grasping. They’ve given up continued existence, and are not freed through the ending of continued existence. And they’ve escaped by continued existence, by rebirth, and are incapable of knowledge and vision of freedom.”
ne19:11.1_0: They meditate observing impermanence in the mind, but are impermanent, suffering, and perishable. They give up continued existence, and have completely understood rebirth, old age, and death, and sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress. They’re not detached from continued existence.
ne19:12.1_0: “As in this way, they give up ignorance, and the choices that lead to future lives, get rid of repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance. And they’ve given up ignorance, and eradicated ignorance.
